title: Findspot of so-called Kabul Hoard
description: The approximate location of the fourth century BCE archaeological deposit that is referred to as either the Kabul or Chaman-i Ḥaz̤ūrī Coin Hoard.

properties.description: Approximate point location as identified on Google Earth base imagery in QGIS 3.x.
properties.title: Location of Kabul Hoard
